sources.title: Cattle Empire (1958)
sources.description: After serving a five year prison sentence for allowing his men to destroy a town in a drunken spree, a trail boss is hired by the same town's leading citizen to drive their cattle to Fort Clemson. Complicating matters, a rival cattle baron also hires the cattle driver to lead his herd. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/cattle-empire-1958/

metadata.Plot: After serving a five year prison sentence for allowing his men to destroy a town in a drunken spree, a trail boss is hired by the same town's leading citizen to drive their cattle to Fort Clemson. Complicating matters, a rival cattle baron also hires the cattle driver to lead his herd.
metadata.Writer: Endre Bohem, Eric Norden, Daniel B. Ullman
metadata.Actors: Joel McCrea, Gloria Talbott, Don Haggerty
